Одна из тех игр, которых я прошел будучи мелким упырем!

И вновь игра стала революционной в своем году, и наделала не мало шумихи! У новой части обновилась текстуры, офигенная физика, и отличный компьютерный разум (Или как там ето называется). Я могу ща повторится, но это не страшна, и лучше сказать сразу, что все части данной франшизы, являются самыми лучшими на все времена! 

Сюжет: И вновь, ВЫ, Великий Гордон Фримен просыпаетесь после отдыха, просыпаетесь в Сити-17, где люди стали пораборащаны инопланетными существами комбайны. Само сражение велось, если я правильно помню (Если нет, то простите), 7 часов. После порабощение, людей стали брать и промывать мозги, и создавать из них комбайнов (Альянс). Теперь вам нужно разобраться со всем этим бредом, и возглавить сопротивление против захватчиков!

Геймплей: Как было сказано ранее, у игры классная физика, а в остальном все так же, как и в первой части! Бегай, стреляй, только было добавлена функция (В НАШИ ГОЛОВЫ) думать! Были добавлены транспорт, обширный оружие, не так много, но грави-пушка стала прям конфеткой в этой игре. Я не говорил, но уже с 1 части, благодаря движка, появились некоторые интересные способы передвижение, по типу бенихоп! Это тип передвижение, когда вы прыгаете, и не нажимая кнопку вперед, а именно кнопки влево право, начинали быстро передвигаться! Их много, а может и нет, так что не буду перечислять прям все, но хотите на них посмотреть, то ищите стримеров, которые спидранят игру. Локации так же получились классными, и более разнообразными, чем первый, от переулков города, до пустынь, особенно классная Ревельхольм! 

Музыка: Ооо да, в этой игре есть несколько классных песен, которые были прямо отлично добавлены в туда, где им и место! 

Как итог: Что, основной сюжет разделился на несколько эпизодов, и предысторию виде vr игры! Но я точно не помню дату, но игра не закончены, второй эпизод вышел ай как давно, из-за чего хочется наконец то продолжение, но не будем об этом. Игра была не мало раз пройдена мной, у игры много плюсов, и огромная фан база, в которую ранее входил и я, но щас не в хожу, но это не значит, что я не люблю игру, я ее все еще люблю! 
10 Охеренной памяти из 10!

I used to play this game included in The Orange Box on the Xbox 360 and man, I've forgotten how amazing and fun this game really is since I've got it again on the PC! 

First, the weapons in the game feels really great to use. 
For example, you got the iconic Crowbar which can be quite useful to fight against Headcrabs, the MP5 which is a good weapon to use against weak enemies, the Shotgun which is a handy weapon against Zombies as you aim right through their head, the Crossbow to snipe enemies at long range and of course, the Gravity Gun which is really fun to use and is also a physic-based weapon that you can use against your enemies as you throw objects and also explosive objects right at them.

You'll also encounter different types of enemies during the game too such as the Combine soldiers, Zombies, Manhacks, Gunships and Striders which I like fighting up against.
Each chapter in the game feels so unique which makes it feel different and adding some variety into it because of the Airboat section in Chapter 4, the Zombie-infested town segment in Chapter 6 and the Strider fight in Chapter 11.

In Half-Life 2, the atmosphere feels cold and dark as it fits the tone and has this dystopian sort of setting which I really like!
The exploration in the game is pretty good too because you can explore and discover optional/secret areas and search for hidden stashes and supplies. 
The game has such memorable moments and plus, the physics engine is still impressive to this very day!

I also like the music in Half-Life 2 as it feels so good to listen to and also keeps you pumping and hyped throughout the game while pushing through against your enemies.
And in general, the gameplay feels good and fun to play as you fight through enemies, shooting explosive barrels against your foes, doing some puzzles, exploring areas, expanding your weapon roster which feels really satisfying as I find a new weapon to use, driving vehicles, avoiding hazards/traps and using different tactics against all sorts of enemies.

Half-Life 2 is such a blast to play and if you haven't played it already then buy it, because I would recommend you to and still, it is such a great game! It is one of the best games I have ever played and one of the best FPS shooters too!

This game still holds up well!

I've been messing around Sorce engine games since I was very little, yet I haven't brought myself to play Half-Life series until this year. Interactive graphics, scripted story events, realistic gameplay, immersive plot and accompanying NPCs are the reasons for which I am sure Half-Life 2 is still an exceptional game and it hasn't grown old even after 16 years of its release.

Honestly, what can I say that hasn't already been said about Half Life 2 and it's following episodes?

Don't let my measly "20 hours played" fool you-  with the amount of time I have combined in EP 0 and EP 1 & 2 as a whole on Steam including a few mods and the ungodly amount of times I replayed it before in the past back when it first came out on the Orange Box back in 2007- I definitely have WAY more than just "20 hours played" I'll tell you that! 
Little me really had no idea what was in store for her when she picked up that little black and orange case for the PS3-

I've practically grown up with the Half Life franchise- what with sharing the same birth year as the original Half Life 1 for one thing- and it's definitely whats shaped my tastes for gaming as it was my very first look at an FPS shooter, (considering my parents weren't gamers it was hard to come by things back then for me) not a bad choice if I do say so myself! 
Personally, the Half Life franchise means a lot to me and I have so many wonderful memories of watching playthrough's, SFM's and GMOD videos made in and about the series that have all helped keep me attached still to this day, especially with it's revival thanks to Valve FINALLY putting out a new one- took you long enough guys!!

I adore the characters, the gameplay, the amazingly unique musical score by Kelly Bailey, the weapons- even the overall general atmosphere in Half Life 2 where despite its dark and moody, depressing tone there's an underlying humour to thing's that's just so "Valve"- and nobody can just forget good ole Dr. Gordon Freeman, it'd be almost physically impossible! He's a popular guy.

Rest assured I'll not stop loving this game any time soon and if I'm honest I can't think of a reason on why I haven't written any kind of review for the series before now- other than perhaps I've been playing the game too much over the years to be able to do so ;)

(This is a very personal review of course so it may not be too helpful to newcomers of the series but as you can see this game means a lot to me still despite how old it is so I feel like that's a good indicator to how well it still all holds up to this day <3)

现代FPS游戏的奠基者之一，乐趣不断的线性冒险游戏。
虽然是二代，但是没玩过一代的也可以游玩，两代之间的联系并不是很多。
绝对值得一玩的神作。

缺点是，V社在环境渲染上没有做功夫，不过说不定是故意为之......
导致游玩的大部分时间里，你会被一股强烈的孤独感笼罩，仿佛这个世界只剩下了你自己。
如果加点环境表现，小动物，或者丰富环境音细节，感觉会好一些。
另外部分章节还是有一定恐怖要素的，请结合自身能力酌情游玩。
It's just awesome!!! One of THE most inspiring Games of all time! Loved it when i was a kid - love it still!!!
